nodes.text: VidGraph was a company that manufactured macrobinoculars. The Jedi Padawan Ezra Bridger owned a pair of custom macrobinoculars created from scrap parts made by VidGraph and the manufacturers Naescorcom and Neuro-Saav.

VidGraph was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2015 reference book Star Wars Rebels: Visual Guide: Epic Battles written by Adam Bray. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, the company was first mentioned in the 1997 West End Games roleplaying game source book Rules of Engagement: The Rebel SpecForce Handbook by Timothy S. O'Brien.
